footer.delivery_terms: Delivery service outside the city is done until 18:00

about.our_goal_2: The best product at a low price
about.text1: Svecha.am is a family business founded in 2018 by two brothers who have been working in the field of auto diagnostics and electricians since 2010, gaining experience in this field over the years and have become professionals in their field. Having a lot of experience behind us, we set a goal to create professionally ground for specific spare parts in this area, we saw that there are many offers for these spare parts on our market, but our goal was three main points:
about.point1: Provide the most transparent information about the details
about.point2: Always be honest with the client
about.point3: Customer care, which is provided by a full consultation on the problem
about.text2: Having honest and friendly relations with all our customers, we always gave advice on the choice of one or another spare part, sometimes we consulted on the problems that customers faced with electrical issues, so that the client felt about the care and friendship from our side, based on these two main rules have gained a large number of customers and friends throughout the country.
about.text3: Transparency, honesty and care! - Our motto.

cart.order_success: Your order has been successfully placed, our specialist will contact you shortly
